游戏本身确实是经典之作，但毕竟受限于发行年代，不建议买，也不建议玩，想买就等折扣，想玩就用手柄：
有极具风格的美术，不过画面粗糙，类似joker、稻草人的人物建模还可以说线条流畅、特色鲜明，但是戈登、哈莉这些人的建模就难免太简陋，戈登长得跟拜登似的，感觉下一秒就要拉泡大的；
战斗方面，boss战数量有限而且“贝恩”戏份太多，这倒也罢了，还改视角，键盘操作极度别扭，wasd很难及时调整视角朝向，相当致命，几度摔键盘；
地图设计已经相对成熟，室内遭遇战难度不大而且相对完善，但是“相对”成熟就是不够成熟，没有后三部的开放世界，引导也一般，通风管道的出场率太高了，感觉不是蝙蝠侠是老鼠人（代入感更强了呢）；
剧情结合演出相当不错，这个是系列一贯优点，不多说。
PS：系列作品都不支持简体中文，补丁可百度自寻。

185970551.review:
Playing Batman: Arkham Asylum 15 years after its release, I knew not to expect it to dazzle me like modern productions. I completed the story on the easiest difficulty and honestly don’t feel the need to replay it on a higher one. While I reached the credits, I didn’t collect all the Riddler trophies. By the end, my progress stood at 70%.

Pros:
- Arkham Island is stunning.
- character models are wonderful.
- Batman’s rogues’ gallery is diverse and fascinating.
- the music, voice acting, and dialogue are top-tier.
- phenomenal atmosphere.
- I appreciate the combat system—it pioneered this now-iconic style...
Cons:
- ...but it’s clear later games did it much better, and at some point, combat became a chore for progression.
- the story is nothing to write poems about—very average.
- main character progression feels poorly executed.
- platforming sections can be frustrating.
- too many collectibles with too little reward to justify finding them all.
- why aren’t there Polish subtitles? I understood everything in English, but it’s been 15 years—creators could’ve added them.
- the game crashed once during a cutscene.
- I couldn’t play it comfortably or clearly on my Steam Deck.

Despite its mostly minores flaws, the game’s strengths shine brightly. While not perfect, it’s easy to see why Arkham Asylum became a classic.

185963285.review:
CAMPANHA: É o básico esperado de um Batman, prender o coringa e logo em seguida o coringa foge e o jogo todo você vai atrás dele e evitando os desastres que ele tenta cometer.

JOGABILIDADE: Esse jogo tem várias mecânicas inovadoras, principalmente para sua época de lançamento, muitas mecânicas usadas nesse jogo foi porta de abertura para jogos recentes como o do Homem Aranha por exemplo.

COMBATE: O combate é muito divertido e te da a liberdade de fazer grande parte do jogo no stealth ou ir dando porrada em todo mundo.

PONTOS NEGATIVOS: Muito repetitivo, as boss fights são bem simples e na grande parte das vezes você não luta com o boss em si e só luta contra os prisioneiros, batalha final com o coringa bem decepcionante, algumas partes do jogo tem um número exagerado de inimigos(o que se torna massante). Os comandos de combate muitas vezes não são responsivos e o Batman muitas vezes é muito lerdo e com um monte de inimigo em volta se torna estressante.
Resumindo, é um bom jogo porém repetitivo, previsível e datado, mas foi muito inovador.

NOTA: 7/10

185916877.review:
Let me tell you something: Killer Croc isn’t just a boss fight—he’s a trauma event. This 10-foot-tall lizard man with the voice of a demon gargling rocks turned my gaming session into a horror movie I didn’t sign up for.

The game tells you to “move quietly” like that’s even possible when your heartbeat is louder than a dubstep drop. Then you hear it: thud… thud… THUD.

Croc’s entrance isn’t fair. The man leaps out of the shadows like a scaly freight train, roaring something about eating you for dinner. Suddenly, you’re not Batman anymore—you’re an all-you-can-eat buffet on legs. The worst part? He doesn’t even run. No, he stalks you, like he knows you’ll trip over your own panic.

Then there’s the whole “run back to the platform and blow it up” mechanic. Oh, you like calm, strategic gameplay? TOO BAD. 

But it’s not just the gameplay. It’s his vibe. The guy literally says, “I will feast on your bones,” and you BELIEVE HIM. He doesn’t just want to win—he wants to ruin you emotionally.

After the sewer section, I paused the game, stared at the wall, and reconsidered every life choice that led me to this moment. Is this what Bruce Wayne feels like every night? Is this why he’s so grumpy?

Killer Croc isn’t just a boss fight—he’s a survival horror experience masquerading as a lizard man. If you play this game, be ready to cry, scream, and question your sewer-related confidence. 15/10. Would get PTSD from Croc again.

185915765.review:
This game is really fun. The atmosphere and music are great. It looks and plays incredible (after some minor performance problems miraculously kinda just went away). The combat, as well as the finisher/ critical hit cinematics, are a bit dated, but not in a way that seriously impacts the enjoyability (they're actually pretty funny). The game is a little backtracky at points, especially if you are going for 100%. It can get a little annoying having to backtrack through large sections of the island without additional shortcuts (to my knowledge), or at least the main door to an area unlocking. These are minor nitpicks though. The gameplay and story are awesome.

Another thing that I didn't love was that 99% of the time, you're just fighting thugs. The Bane boss fight is just a tanky thug fight, Harley is just fight 20 thugs, and even the final boss, Joker, is literally just fight thugs then punch Joker 3 times. Literally the only unique fight in the game is Poison Ivy and they still find a way to make you fight thugs in it lol. Aside from that, the Scarecrow sections are really cool and interesting. 

Overall, I highly recommend playing through this game. It's not too long, relatively straightforward, and a ton of fun. I also think you don't need to know anything about Batman to enjoy this game.

185882463.review:
i pressed the x button pretty damn well tbh

This game has a lot going for it and I'm honestly upset I never got to play it when I was younger. The visuals would have blown my mind as a kid and it holds up really well today. The gameplay is pretty simple: sneak around or beat up a swarm of goons until a cut scene happens, and thankfully the game is short enough where you won't be so bored you gouge your eyes out. 

Speaking of bored, I didn't much care for the Riddler's inclusion sadly. Collectibles are always welcome in a game and there are plenty in this one that you're gonna run into just by progressing, but lord knows I didn't care enough to actively solve any riddles for certain areas after the 2 hour mark. The codex I DID like though. Having biographies for these iconic characters as well as interview tapes for the inmates of the asylum (I also liked that I could listen to them in the background and still play the game). 

I did play this on normal mode and I'm sure I'd feel differently on a higher difficulty but I do wish the game was a bit "harder." The stealth segments are very non-linear, giving you at least 2-3 options you can start with the second you enter a room full of Joker's buddies. This aspect I do like, it doesn't need to be changed BUT I felt like after unlocking the hanging takedown, a lot of the tension goes out the window. The game has a lot of gizmos and gadgets that you can unlock with only a few of them being necessary to complete the campaign. A lot of these optional tools I picked up, I never used, really; Outside of an "oh yea, what does this do" moment, I never felt the need to be creative with them.

One recurring theme I liked a lot was the Scarecrow's segments, especially the last one. Running the intro back but reversing Batman and Joker's roles was really cool, and the boss fight was nice as well. FUCK the Killer Croc section though. That was pure, unfiltered ass used to stretch out the length of the game another 20 minutes. I would have rather swam in that nasty sewer water and get my suit all wet then stand on a bunch of wooden pallets that all conveniently float and are next to each other throughout the entire sewer system of this island-- Who thought of this?

On the topic of dumb things this game does, a really glaring one is have the camera so close to Batman you could grab his cape and throw it over his head. He takes up 1/3 of the screen and it makes moving around really obnoxious. Sprinting is somehow worse with Batman moving from the left side of the screen to the center and his flowing cape covering most of the bottom half.

Overall, the game is really fun and I'm looking forward to finishing the arkham trilogy and not touching Origins.

185863903.review:
[h2] Uma bom começo para o Universo Arkham [/h2]

Batman Arkham Asylum é um início sólido para a saga Arkham! O jogo possui todos os recursos básicos que serão melhorados em futuros jogos, mas devo admitir que é um pouco simplório neste jogo aqui.

A história é boa, mas sem muita profundidade, senti que os vilões poderiam ser mais explorados em questão de diálogos e narrativa. O mundo semi aberto é bem elaborado, mas há bastante backtracking para as mesmas áreas várias e várias vezes por motivos bestas. Os enigmas do Charada são excelentes, bem difíceis e alguns exigem bastante raciocínio; E o combate nem se fala, o pico do jogo sem dúvidas, um sistema que virou o ponto alto de toda franquia.

Eu recomendo o jogo apesar de algumas críticas em relação a história e level design, também entendo que é injusto comparar com futuros jogos da saga, afinal esse deveria ser o primeiro a ser jogado, mas como não foi assim, sempre vai ter um resquício de "o próximo fez melhor". O que é bom na verdade, pois significa que os desenvolvedores evoluíram de jogo para jogo.

Então se você já jogou os próximos jogos do Batman Arkham, espere uma qualidade inferior dos demais, mas ainda sim vale a pena ser jogado. Para minha Review completa, acesse o meu canal do Youtube: [url=youtube.com/@victorquiet] @victorquiet [/url]

I'm not a fan of superheroes, but I gave this game a chance, and I don't regret it. Even after 15 years, the combat feels satisfying, and it's not the button-mashing type of combat, which is very important. The graphics are okay, and the story is decent for this type of game. The voice acting is excellent.

Batman: Arkham Asylum is mostly linear. This isn't necessarily a problem, but I think games like this could benefit greatly from an open-world approach. Other than that, boss fights, in general, are disappointing, especially the final fight. With such a solid combat system, I expected at least one epic fight at the end of the game, but it turns out the last one is also the worst.

That being said, the game is good—good enough to make me want to continue with this series.

185756853.review:
---OVERVIEW---
This game is the weakest entry in the Arkham series. If you are playing this game after playing later Arkham games, then this game will noticeably feel like a step down gameplay-wise. For example, having played Arkham Knight I found myself wanting to do an insta-launch after using my batclaw. However, I forgot that that feature wasn't introduced until a later Arkham game. So you end up feeling deprived in a number of ways if you're playing this after playing other Arkham games. Notwithstanding, the game is still fun in its own right and worth your time. My advice is to buy this game when its on sale.

---PROS---
(1) RESPECT THE LEGACY. While this game isn't the strongest entry of the Arkham series, nevertheless, this game laid the foundation for later Arkham games to later build upon. This game is historic in that it marks the beginning of Arkham's celebrated legacy. Again, the game is not the best Arkham game, but the series had to start somewhere.

(2) HIGHLY SATISFYING COMBAT SYSTEM. The Arkham series is perhaps most acclaimed for its combat system. While this is the earliest (and jankiest) iteration of the combat system, the system is still highly satisfying to master. This is not a game that rewards players for button mashing. In fact, button mashing will be to your detriment. Instead, the combat system is built to rewards patience players who put in their inputs deliberately and seek to get a sense of the "flow" of the fight to pace themselves accordingly. Gameplay wise, the combat system is one of the strongest parts of the game.

---CONS---
(1) THE MINI MAP IS CLUNKILY DESIGNED. Unless you use a mod you have to frequently pause in order use the mini map since it's not part of the UI during gameplay. This results in a clunky gameplay experience that ruins the flow of the game due to frequent pausing. 

(2) THERE ARE VARIOUS TYPES OF CONTROLLER INPUT ISSUES. (A) Many people who use Xbox or Playstation-style controllers report input issues where using a controller renders the game unplayable on PC due to it creating a bug where the camera is constantly spinning on your screen. To my knowledge, there are are workarounds, but the mere fact you have to troubleshoot is a mark against the game. (B) Additionally, I experienced input issues with my Joystick where the game sometimes wouldn't register movement unless I moved my joystick a certain way. To be clear, this was not a problem with my hardware. My controller works just fine on other games. (3) There are other input detection issues as well. For example, there are many times where you'll be directly next to an enemy and hit the hit button only to whiff. Issues like this are *persistent* and significantly detract from the gameplay experience.

---OVERALL GRADE---
C. Fun, but technical issues bring down the games grade. If it weren't for the input issues this game would be a B-.

185752105.review:
Uma obra-prima dos jogos de super-heróis. Desenvolvido pela Rocksteady, o jogo coloca você no papel do Batman, enfrentando uma invasão do Asilo Arkham liderada pelo Coringa e outros vilões icônicos. A narrativa é envolvente, com um ótimo desenvolvimento de personagens e uma atmosfera sombria e imersiva.

A jogabilidade combina combate fluído e técnicas de furtividade, permitindo que você lute contra múltiplos inimigos e se mova pelas sombras. A exploração do asilo é repleta de segredos e desafios, incentivando a investigação e a coleta de itens.

A trilha sonora e a dublagem, com a participação de Mark Hamill como Coringa e Kevin Conroy como Batman, são de altíssima qualidade. Os gráficos, embora datados, ainda são impressionantes e bem feitos, com um design de personagens fiel aos quadrinhos.

Em resumo, Batman: Arkham Asylum é um dos melhores jogos de super-heróis de todos os tempos, combinando uma excelente história, jogabilidade e atmosfera imersiva. Se você ainda não jogou, não perca a chance de viver a experiência de ser o Cavaleiro das Trevas.

Nota: 10/10 – Uma experiência imperdível.

185678739.review:
The highlight of this game has to be, hands down, the combat and action. Pulling off those combos can be challenging yet highly engaging at the same time. Despite being 15 years old, this ageless masterpiece remains incredibly fun to play. Some aspects feel fairly simplistic in terms of gameplay; for example, the stealth elements weren’t as enjoyable as in other games, and the usual Batman story is presented in a somewhat mediocre way. Nonetheless, everything else is top-notch.

For some reason, I found this game surprisingly funny, and I’m not entirely sure why. It might be the way Batman looks and behaves in cutscenes, the facial animations, or even the act of hanging from indoor gargoyles. All of this made me laugh or grin at times. Maybe it felt somehow weird or slightly off-putting, or it’s just the fact that I’m playing a 15-year-old game. Even the lighting struck me as amusing for some reason. Or could it be nostalgia?

Interestingly, I also noticed similarities to LEGO games, as it follows the same formula of "return when you have this or that unlocked." All in all, if you enjoy beating up bad guys in close-quarters combat, this is the perfect game for you.

185554299.review:
This might be the most nostalgic game of all time for me. It definitely is my favorite. Let me explain why:

First off, this game absolutely exudes atmosphere. Batman: Arkham Asylum holds the title for me of the best game in the Arkham trilogy. Arkham Island is rendered gorgeously. Secrets are around every corner, with deep references to Batman's lore. As a pseudo Metroidvania, you do a lot of backtracking in this game, but I never once felt lost. 

This game holds up INCREDIBLY well on all fronts. The writing is intelligent and sharp. The graphics are gorgeous, the animations fluid, the gameplay genre defining. This is the definitive superhero game. I firmly believe this game set a new standard in the industry, not just for superhero games, but for all video games. The freeflow combat system is still one of the best combat systems ever implemented in a video game. You feel like an unstoppable force of nature when you pummel waves of Joker's thugs with nothing but your fists, a couple of batarangs, and complete and total mastery of 127 forms of martial arts (lore accurate). 

This was the first video game I ever owned. Back in the day, my Mom drove me to my local gamestop and I purchased an xbox 360 and a copy of Batman: Arkham Asylum with the money I earned by mowing lawns all summer. And I'm very glad I did. As a child, my jaw was on the floor as I watched my favorite comic book character jump to life like he did in the shows and movies, only this time I had the amazing privilege of slipping on the cowl myself. 

I cannot recommend this game enough. Buy it, experience it, love it. 

And finally, rest in peace Kevin Conroy. My Batman. Gone but NEVER forgotten. Until my dying day, I will replay this game every couple of years and remember you.

No le tenía mucha fe por los años que ya tiene, pero sin duda fue una sorpresa ver que envejeció de maravilla. Gráficamente es excelente, especialmente cómo lograron crear esa atmósfera de estar en un manicomio, que llega a darte un corrientazo en la espalda en ciertos momentos.

La jugabilidad es grandiosa: la manera de pelear, esquivar, el sigilo, su sistema de combos y las herramientas que tiene el personaje. No por nada es un antes y un después en el tema de videojuegos de superhéroes, e incluso de otras categorías. Sin duda, es un juego adelantadísimo para el año en que salió.

Además, su historia es muy chévere y su folio de personajes es diverso y muy interesante. Con cada villano, hay un modo diferente para derrotarlo, y no el típico "esquivo, esquivo, golpe y ¡WIN!". El mundo del Espantapájaros es genial.

No dudes en jugarlo y comenzar la saga Arkham con este grandioso juego.

185492947.review:
TLDR: This is the first game in the Batman Arkham series and follows Batman bringing Joker to the Arkham asylum before things go awry and Joker assumes control of the island while Batman has to fight his way through multiple different Batman villains to get to Joker. The gameplay is pretty simple, go from A to B with collectibles thrown around each map that unlock a quite expansive codex entry for several Batman villains, many who aren't in the game at all other than their references. The combat system is based on being fluid with your actions and tactful instead of button mashing. It feels clunky at first, and it is compared to the rest of the series, eventually you will get the feel for it and you will feel very satisfied as you hit the high combos. Definitely a good game, graphics don't hold up well, but their cartoony charm makes up for it. No major bugs. 7/10

Story: You take the role as Batman delivering a captured Joker to Arkham Asylum. Normally Batman would just hand him off, but this time he has a gut feeling Joker has something up his sleeve. That gut feeling is proven correct when, surprise, Joker takes over the facility. Its all a plot to get Batman to the island so Joker can try and kill him. Batman must go around the facility saving workers from inmates and various super-villains. While also having to fight his way past several super-villains who are part of a gauntlet Joker has arranged. The story is pretty linear with no real side missions, however there is a lot of story delivered through collectibles. I enjoyed the story and it holds up well for today. 7/10

Gameplay: The missions are pretty linear, go save X person from Y villains. Collect collectibles along the way and solve riddles to unlock an expansive codex entry list with many villains on it, some who do not appear in the game other than through references.  You gain new equipment as the story progresses so you can unlock more collectibles. Combat is focused on you fluidly moving from enemy to enemy while timing your attacks so you don't get locked into an attack animation and unable to counter. It punishes button mashing. It feels quite clunky at fist, but once you get the feel for it the combat is very satisfying. There are also stealth sections where Batman stalks his prey. Its simple and it works. The game also includes a large challenge mode for outside of story content. 7/10

Graphics: Its a game from 2009, adequate graphics for the time. I think the cartoon like old graphics add to the charm more than they take away. 7/10

Bugs: I had two crashes that were self resolved upon relaunching the game. 

Conclusion: Batman Arkham Asylum is a great game for its time and a decent one for today. This game embraces the comic series origins by providing a plethora of entries into various characters from the Batman series, the art style, and sound effects. Gameplay is good for 2009 though definitely feels railroad like compared to games made today. It has many collectibles and a large challenge mode. The story is decent, though the whole story must be gained through obtaining all collectibles which is unfortunate. 7/10

185388831.review:
[h1]Batman: Arkham Asylum – игра, которая всё изменила[/h1]

Когда вышла Batman: Arkham Asylum, мало кто ожидал от неё чего-то крутого. Но Rocksteady сделали не просто игру, а шедевр, который до сих пор помнят.

Боевая система – это отдельное удовольствие. Ты легко комбинируешь удары, контратаки и уклонения, чувствуя себя настоящим Бэтменом. А стелс? Тут ты реально охотишься: подвешиваешь врагов вниз головой, вырубаешь из тени, и они начинают паниковать.

Сюжет держит в напряжении. Джокер, Харли Квинн, Пугало – каждый персонаж проработан до мелочей. Атмосфера Аркхема мрачная и давящая, а музыка идеально её дополняет.

Arkham Asylum стала эталоном для игр по комиксам и показала, как делать качественные проекты. Даже спустя годы она остаётся одной из лучших игр про супергероев.

185337141.review:
NOTA: 9.25 de 10

A fecha del 2010, el mejor juego de Batman y de superhéroes.

Sistema de combate muy elaborado y divertido.

Excelente en gráficos, físicas, animaciones, cinemáticas, audio y música.

Idioma de voces y textos en español, de gran calidad.

Contenido extra: arte conceptual y biografías de personajes.

Guardado automático de partidas pero bastante frecuente.


Aún así no todo es bueno:

- Opciones de configuración externas solamente. Por ejemplo, no permite probar y redefinir teclas desde dentro del juego.

- Duración limitada a unas 12 horas. Además abusa del tiempo obligando a volver a ciertas zonas inaccesibles con habilidades o artilugios nuevos.

- Historia coherente en general, aunque las escenas detectivescas para conseguir pistas son un poco forzadas. Además algunos eventos de la trama avanzan demasiado rápido.

- IA y dificultad no del todo pulidas. El campo de visión enemigo no les permite ver por encima de su nivel de altura. El sigilo está parcialmente roto ya que los villanos no detectan ruido moderado detrás suya, ni agachado ni de pie. Los mapas disponen de excesivos y enormes conductos de ventilación, por suerte el sigilo no se exige siempre, ya que muchas de veces las peleas son de frente. 


Conclusión: totalmente recomendado y su [u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/gequi_/recommended/200260]secuela[/url][/u] todavía más.

185207101.review:
На дворе 2020 год, и я реализую свое большое желание, собираю игровой ПК. Ох, сколько радости то было. Сразу качаю стим и начинаю покупать игры, которые всегда хотел сыграть в детстве. И одной из первых, в моей библиотеке стим, появляется серия игр про огромную летучую мышь переростка. Скачиваю, запускаю и открываю для себя мир комиксов про Бетмена, с совсем новой стороны. Вот на дворе 2025 год, я скачиваю Бетмена снова, до прохожу на 100%, и начинаю писать комментарий. Так чем же поразило данное творение меня тогда и чем увлекло сейчас, этим я и хочу поделиться с вами. 

	Сюжет. Все действие игры происходит на изолированном острове, в лечебнице Аркхем. Находясь на одиноком острове посреди бушующего моря, вдали от цивилизованного общества, еще острее ощущаешь, это место создано специально для самых отъявленных преступников и неизлечимо душевнобольных. В такой веселой и дружелюбной компании, Бетмену предстоит провести, где-то двадцать часиков, как всегда, под нашим управлением. Повествование начинается со знакомства, нас знакомят с главным противником и незаменимым дополнением Бетмена, безумным клоуном Джокером. Он в силу своих интеллектуальных возможностей и сотрудничества с другими заключенными, умудряется реализовать план побега и захвата управления над лечебницей. Так завязка дарит нам начало одной из лучших историй которые я видел в комиксах. Хороший парень, против толпы громил и безумцев, но не стоит забывать и про сливки супер злодейского общества. История познакомит нас с персонажами, которых узнают даже те, кто не особо знаком с историей о Темном Рыцаре. Повествование ведется не рвано, каждое действия персонажа постарались хорошо обосновать. От чего вопросов к рациональности действий Бетмена, не возникает. Хорошо сюжетно вплетены все анлоки и апгрейды бет приборов. Одним словом, небольшая, хорошо сплочённая история которая не дает заскучать.

	Гейплей. Игровой процесс из себя представляет смесь экшен боев, поиска секретов и небольших вкраплений стелса. По порядку. Бои из себя представляют файты-липучки, ты вовремя прожимаешь удар, контратаку, уворот и спец приёмы, счетчик комбо растет, и твой персонаж летает от одного врага к другому. Ощущается динамично и живо, а немного научившись жать кнопки вовремя у тебя получается неимоверно красивый бой, больше похожий на танец. Стелс, не затянутый и по-своему разнообразный, большой арсенал бет примочек дарит возможность не линейного прохождения скрытного сегмента. Большой арсенал приспособлений Бетмена, также помогает в поиске секретов Загадочника. А секретов тут немало, целых 240 штук. Правда ради справедливости стоит сказать, что секреты ищутся легко и интересно, по мере прохождения сюжета вы найдете больше половины не напрягаясь. А вот где придется попотеть так это на испытаниях, их тут 16 штук, 8 боевых и 8 стелс, а нужны они для 100% прохождения. Но немного потренировавшись, сложности превращаются в чистое наслаждение от процесса.

	Атмосфера и мир. Как я уже писал выше, погружение на высоте. Играя ты будто попадаешь в мир комикса. Где тебя ждет гнетущая атмосфера отрезанной от мира психушки, где тебя ждет опасность в виде любого местного обитателя. Одним словом, одобряем. Игровой мир, несмотря на свои скромные размеры, содержит в себе тайну и интригу, от чего не устаешь исследовать остров на протяжении всей игры. А постепенная выдача бет инструментов, хорошо помогает в этом. Находя загадки и записи, меняешь свое мнение о злодеях, некоторым злодеям начинаешь сочувствовать, а некоторых начинаешь еще больше ненавидеть. Понимаешь, кому-то не повезло сойти с ума, но кто-то уже родились безумными.

	Итог. Кто не знакомый с данной серией, милости прошу. Оно того стоит. Первая часть оправдывает и подталкивает игрока проходить все испытания и находить загадки Ридлера. 《蝙蝠侠阿卡姆疯人院》绝对是游戏史上的经典之作！今天又重温了一遍，依旧被它深深吸引。
 
游戏剧情简直绝了，从蝙蝠侠押送小丑进入疯人院开始，一场惊心动魄的冒险就此展开。小丑的疯狂、哈莉·奎茵的狡黠、稻草人的恐怖、毒藤女的妖娆……一个个经典反派被刻画得入木三分，他们与蝙蝠侠之间的斗智斗勇让整个故事充满了张力和悬念，仿佛一部精彩绝伦的黑暗电影。
 
战斗系统也十分出色，自由流动式格斗战让玩家可以尽情施展蝙蝠侠的高超武艺，拳拳到肉的打击感加上各种武器和连招的运用，使得战斗既刺激又富有策略性。而潜行部分更是让玩家体验到了蝙蝠侠作为黑暗中的守护者的魅力，利用阴影和环境悄悄接近敌人，然后一击制敌，成就感满满。
 
还有那令人惊艳的画面和氛围营造，阴暗潮湿的哥谭市、哥特式风格的疯人院建筑，以及恰到好处的音效，都让人仿佛置身于蝙蝠侠的黑暗世界之中，感受到那种无处不在的压迫感和紧张感。
 
如果你还没有玩过这款游戏，那可真是太可惜了！强烈推荐给所有喜欢动作冒险游戏和蝙蝠侠的玩家们，相信我，一旦你进入这个黑暗的世界，就会被它深深吸引，无法自拔！

185133744.review:
The Game That Redefined Superhero Games

Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY Edition is a masterpiece that set the gold standard for superhero games. It’s a perfect blend of engaging combat, compelling storytelling, and immersive atmosphere that brings the world of Batman to life like never before. Whether you’re a die-hard fan of the Dark Knight or just love action-adventure games, this is an experience not to be missed.

The game’s story, written by Batman: The Animated Series veteran Paul Dini, is a gripping and well-paced narrative that feels like a classic Batman tale. When the Joker takes over Arkham Asylum, chaos erupts, and it’s up to you to stop him and his iconic rogues gallery, including Harley Quinn, Scarecrow, and Killer Croc. The voice acting, featuring Kevin Conroy as Batman and Mark Hamill as the Joker, is exceptional, adding depth and authenticity to every scene.

The combat system is a standout feature. The Freeflow Combat is fluid, satisfying, and intuitive, allowing you to take on multiple enemies with effortless style. It’s easy to pick up but has enough depth to reward skill and strategy, especially as you unlock new gadgets and upgrades.

Exploration is equally rewarding. The asylum itself is a character in its own right—a dark, foreboding setting filled with secrets, hidden Riddler trophies, and Easter eggs for fans of the Batman universe. The mix of open exploration and linear progression strikes a perfect balance, keeping the pacing tight while encouraging you to delve into every corner of this iconic location.

Stealth gameplay is another highlight, letting you feel like the ultimate predator as you stalk enemies from the shadows, use gadgets like the Batarang and Batclaw, and plan your takedowns. The predator sections are tense and thrilling, making you feel like you truly embody the fearsome persona of Batman.

Visually, even years after its release, Arkham Asylum holds up remarkably well. The Gothic art design, combined with an atmospheric soundtrack, creates a moody and immersive experience that perfectly captures the essence of Gotham’s darkest corners.

This GOTY edition also includes bonus challenge maps, giving you even more content to enjoy once you’ve completed the main story.

Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY Edition isn’t just a game—it’s an experience that immerses you in the world of the Caped Crusader. It’s a must-play for fans of Batman, action games, or anyone looking for a thrilling and unforgettable adventure.

185132211.review:
[h1]Цікава гра проте зі своїми "костилями"[/h1]
Гра являє собою екшн-бойовик-скрадання від третьої особи. Очевидно гра про людину-кажана [strike]"Ватман"-а[/strike] "Бетмен"-а. Хоча це перша гра із серії "сучасних", тут не йтиметься про становлення Брюса Вейна aka "Бетмен", як супергероя. З цього присутні лише флешбеки. Чим вирізняється ця гра серед нею подібних ("Mad Max" наприклад) так це атмосферою. "Mad Max" - пустельна пустка в оточенні головорізів, "Batman: Arkham Asylum" - притулок-в'язниця (психлікарня) з маніяками-убивцями та найстрашнішими лиходіями зібраними з усього Ґотему ув'язненими тут, а також головними антагоністами - "Джокер"-ом та "Харлі Квін". А що буде, якщо дати добровільно (ні) волю "Джокер"-у у місці, наповненому злочинцями, психами та маніяками? Саме так: м'яса, кішкі і голиє сіські Харлі Квін (ноуп).

В нашому розпорядженні звичайно ж присутні ґаджети "Бетмен"-а, відомі з фільмів, такі як: бетаранги, бет-плащ, бет-кіготь, надміцний бет-трос та інші. Сама гра побудована на постійному екшені та боївках, а також вторинних місіях від "Загадник"-а, де на вас чекатимуть всі 240 загадок для розгадки (для Steam-досягнення, наприклад) прихованих у нетрях притулку "Аркхем".

Щодо боївки, тут усе просто і не дуже. У нас є одна лише клавіша удару, за допомогою якого набиваються комбо-удари (а-ля "Naruto Shippuden"), а також клавіша контратаки. Чим більша кількість накопичених непереривних комбо-ударів (без шкоди від ворогів та стану) тим більше досвіду вам надається.

Щодо досвіду. У грі присутні також елементи RPG з прогресією не рівнів, а накопичення досвіду та після заповнення шкали (кола) до максимуму видається 1 поінт для покращення з "Waynetech" (вікно покращень технологій Брюса Вейна), а сама шкала знову скидається і так по колу. Гра надає достатньо ворогів для покращення усього із "Waynetech" до кінця сюжету, тому тут можна трішки "вільно дихати".

Крім того в грі присутні додаткові рівні-челенджі в меню гри, які відкриваються в міру розгадок загадок "Загадник"-а.

[h2]Що мені не сподобалось[/h2]
Проходив вдруге (перший раз у EGS) на максимальній складності. Далі спойлери, тому не кажіть потім, що ви забили, а я вам трішки не напам'ятав.

[spoiler]
З контратаками відбувається інколи не зрозуміла хрінь. Вони або не виконуються (велика затримка спрацювання, через що мене встигають вдарити), або світиться підказка контратаки і тут прикол: опонент може вдарити, а може і не дотягнутись (про не дотягнутись і хітбокси буде трішки далі пізніше). Вибір невеликий, я би сказав єдиний, якщо не хочеш збити шкалу комбо-ударів (в челендж-рівнях це вагомо). І тут як "монетка Харві": успішний блок - подальше накопичення комбо-ударів, провал блокування - витрачений рух на контратаку яка не відбулася + втрата накопиченого числа комбо-ударів.

Щодо хіт-боксів, вони криві, особливо у мутованих Титаном поплічників "Джокер"-а. Особисто мене бісив передостанній бос перед "Джокер"-ом - обидва поплічники наповнені Титаном. Сам фінальний бос-файт з "Джокер"-ом у 4 рази простіший та легший за них.

Також бісило те, що відсутні підказки під час тої-чи-іншої раптової екшн-події, лігво Крока наприклад. Тут ти мав якимось чином сам здогадатися жбурнути в нього бетаранг, щоб тимчасово знешкодити
[/spoiler]

[h2]Висновок[/h2]
Отож, чи сподобалась мені сама гра. Звичайно, що "ТАК". Чи сподобалась мені гра на високій складності враховуючи її проблеми - "НІФІГА". Якщо ви готові ризикнути для здобуття усіх досягнень (більшості з челенджів та боївки) своєю нервовою системою - велкам ту зе страждання. В іншому випадку не парьтесь через це та отримуйте задоволення від сюжету.

Щодо озвучки. Актори озвучування, особливо "Джокер"-а, відіграли свою роль на всі 100.

Щодо затрат на проходження. Проходив на нийвищій складності. За 26.8год. розгадано усі 240 загдок, відкрито усі біографії усіх персонажів та пройдено увесь сюжет. Зібрано усі досягнення, окрім челенджів, оскільки враховуючи "кривизну хіт-боксів" та "ренджів атак NPC" - я забив болт на це.

画面是能勉强接受的程度，毕竟是个老游戏了。我是看了罗伯特帕丁森版的蝙蝠侠感兴趣了才来玩的，游戏模式无非就是潜行和正面突破，很重复，路上还有一堆收集品，我嫌无聊就没怎么收集了，地图只有一个岛那么大，整个主线就是在这个地图上跑来跑去，建筑物内部也到处是管道给你钻，玩多了头疼，剧情中规中矩，典型的超英故事，可圈可点的是蝙蝠侠的打斗动作，以及双boss战，骑泰坦打敌人让我想到了战神的山怪。其他的boss战模式比较重复，并没有让人眼前一新，毕竟这是款老游戏，可以看到许多被后辈学习的东西，毒藤女boss战和漫威银河护卫队里的boss战有点像。
画面走的暗黑画风，看多了审美疲劳，纹理也是老游戏的那种画质，总而言之偶尔拿出来一点点玩也是合格的，但是想一口气打完主线，体验影视剧一般的享受，我觉得是不可行的，且不说重复的战斗，跑酷玩着头疼，光是看画面看久了都感觉审美疲劳，毕竟这款游戏已经很老了，过场动画很模糊，人物模型也不算精良（但是毒藤女好看），所以我的评价是买之前可以看看视频再决定。

185111287.review:
Batman Arkham Asylum, the game that made modern superhero games big and still makes them blush to this day with it's many generation breaking artistic achievements and core gameplay elements that game developers try to re-create and wish to perfect to this very day. It's either that or I belong into the Asylum for Nostalgia Bating myself!

(probably a bit of both) 
   *chuckles in Joker*

With the legendary Kevin Conroy (and in my opinion Batman himself) voicing Batman and the legendary Mark Hamil (Literally Joker himself in my opinion) voicing The Joker and not to forget the stunning Arleen Sorkin (Literally Harley Quinn) voicing Harley Quinn we got ourselves a legendary trio cast of our main characters with Batman being the only Playable one (sadly but Mr. J is also able to be played through Challenge Mode via Mods these days) with many, many more voice actors providing the voices to other memorable Characters that are shown during the story like Tom Kane as Police commissioner Gordon!

In this Legendary Origins Story of the Arkham Batman we set off into the knight and have captured the Joker after having fought and captured The joker at City Hall (Off screen but mentioned)... we get a scene of Batman driving the Joker to the Asylum and a brief but everlasting look at the road and later Gate of the Arkham Asylum Mansion... Whilst it not being the first shot of the game by far but it's the one engraved into my brain to this day of the Doors to Arkham opening as we get a glance of Batman Standing stern in the rain whilst holding Joker down as his captive, this has to be one of my personal favorite shots in gaming history, it further builds the Atmosphere of the game and it's setting as we attempt to escort The Joker to his cell after having second thoughts of capturing him due to the Joker almost letting him do so without a fight at City Hall. As we walk down the path deeper with each step into the heart of the Asylum we get to see the standard procedures being made when delivering a "patient" to the Asylum... with check ups of the Doctors being made and also Security check ups being made as we go deeper into the Mansion. During this World-Building we get to also see and experience the story / relationship between the Bat and the Clown and their overall dynamic STRONGLY reminiscing from the 90's Animated Show The Batman where most of the Soul of this game or better said the Arkham Games so try to go back to and take the essence from for it's Characters and World Building with Paul Dini being one of it's original writers also being the main writer of Arkham Asylum and co writer for the later Arkham City with Paul Crocker and Sefton Hill as it's director again and it comes to show in many ways and it sometimes brings a tear of joy to my eyes to this day when re-playing this game on my console or here on my PC.

The game itself has many, many great sections that are very well thought out with the occasional Scarecrow Hallucinations setting the stage for the Haunting until almost the very end and Joker teasing and testing your patience as the Batman throughout the entire game as you track him down throughout the many, many locations of the Asylum as he plays games with you until the very end where the "Ultimate" and final challenge / fight plays out between The Batman and The Joker.

Whilst mentioning previously about the overall story of the game and some of it's more captivating sequences I'll now get to the more gameplay side of things and dive deeper into that followed by my graphical and artistic analysis at the end. I'll start by saying this; the Freeflow Combat in Batman: Arkham Asylum is the best form of combat ever to be set in a Video-game, as you learn more move-sets throughout your journey by earning experience by taking down thugs and other enemy types across the Island you unlock the ability to add more variety to your combo moves as you progressively stack up combos during big fights between enemy encounters. Speaking of enemy encounters the game has three distinctive (Technically 4) encounters that you come across:

1 - Brawls, they consist of encounters where you're locked into a particular area and are forced to fight against your enemies head on until the area is cleared.

2 - Fights (This was my optional one before mentioned), they consist of random enemy encounters you come across during exploration practically the same as the 1st encounter but with the exception of it being optional since in most cases you can escape these fights therefore being optional.

3 - Predator, (My personal favorite) these encounters consist of being in a locked area and is all about all things stealth and defeating your enemies through silent and gorilla tactics as you improvise when caught. The implementations of gargoyles in these sections are marvelous and everlasting throughout the Arkham Series they are used as an advantage point to scope out the area using your Detective Mode (Thugs cannot see you when not alerted whilst being on top of these structures). Every single time during these encounters you as the player get to truly feel how and what it means to be the Batman as you hunt down your targets one by one as they grow increasingly more scared of you (you can also measure their heartbeats via Detective Mode and their overall state they are in, simply GENIOUS, thank you Sefton Hill for existing for this alone!).

4 - Boss, these encounters are basically your head on fight with a named enemy of Batman: Arkham Asylum and they are basically pretty straight forward with each boss having their own "Move-set" or way to deal with them and not one of them being the same with The Joker (The final Boss and the end of the game) being the weakest and the most dissapointing and Poison Ivy and Killer Croc being the Absolute strongest and most fun gameplay wise (Especially Kille Croc, absolutely love that Old Boy's encounter in the sewers!).

I also wanted to include Scarecrow as an Encounter type on that list but sadly it didn't fit into the review due to iit being too long so I'll just move onto the Art of Batman: Arkham Asylum

I absolutely love the colorpalette of this game with the Bluish cold tones of the security area at the beginning of the game to the green orange and brown black tones of the outside of the Asylum followed with cream and brown colors for some of the interiors that are all applied with an emphasis of making the game feel creepy at almost all the times or with the greenhouse mostly incorporating natural colors the reflect the plant life and flowers which later after the Ivy encounter cover half of the island make it not only visually very stunning for it's time but so, so very unique and creepy. the only thing that is missing that got later introduced into the remaster is the rain and fog... whilst the remaster of this particular game looks and feels improved upon I still feel that some of the original colors of the game got lost as it transitioned from UE2 to UE4.

I have a ton more points to discuss when it comes to the character designs of this game but sadly there isn't enough space for me to go over them all or at all so all i will say is they all feel like they are respectfully and almost intentionally made to look like or resemble their 90s animated series counterparts and I love that so much like I said it at the very beginning the developers were greatly influenced by that and they go to show it all the way till the end!

Overall this game is and will stay a timeless classic, I know and am still very sad to this day that Arleen Sorkin and Kevin Conroy passed away may they both rest in peace and in grace, they helped define these characters to what they are and should be and always remain as in my opinion.

I give the game a 

I AM VENGANCE, I AM THE KNIGHT, I AM BATMAN / 10

★★★★★★★★★★

(Yes ten starts, everybody that settles for less is either too young or simply just doesn't like The Batman and Paul Dini)

Batman: Arkham Asylum jest jak ciemny poemat o ludzkich lękach i złudzeniach. Chłodne korytarze Arkham wiją się w półmroku, a każda kolejna komnata to kolejny rozdział pełen sekretów i szeptów szaleństwa. Walka w tej grze przypomina mroczną symfonię: precyzyjne, ciche uderzenia przeplatają się z echem bijącym o kraty zakładu.
Mrok i desperacja mieszają się tu z nadzieją, którą niesie czarny płaszcz Mrocznego Rycerza. Gdy przechadzasz się wśród zagadek i kolejnych starć z najgorszymi złoczyńcami Gotham, czujesz, jak powoli przenikasz na granicę światła i cienia. Wszystko nabiera intensywności – od skrzypiących drzwi po złowrogie szepty w ciemnych celach.
Właśnie dlatego Arkham Asylum zapada w pamięć: to nie tylko gra akcji, lecz również przejmujący spektakl strachu i determinacji, w którym każdy kolejny krok to mały triumf nad szerzącym się obłędem.

185026926.review:
DISCLAIMER: I played this game only for 1 hour.

I played this game right after the first 2 Assassin's Creed and it is really a game of the same era. The graphics quality look the same (still OK for today), but it has issues with controls, having too much to bind on the controller so you have to do convoluted combinations of buttons all the time.
The story is compelling and you progress with satisfaction through the game, though it is a bit 'restraining at times' (eg. if you find a way to dodge some ennemies to go to the objective, the game won't let you, and you still have to fight them.)

I recommend the game for its ambiance, plot, characters, and attention to details, but 20€ for a 15 years old game is a bit much for me: prefer it when in sale.

[When you first fight Bane, there are two types of charges. One is a charge followed by a stun, which you need to exploit to reduce his health, and the other is just a regular charge.

But for some reason, maybe it's a bug, Bane only does the regular charge and throws rocks afterward. Since the stun doesn't activate, the fight becomes much harder.

So what I did was set up sticky bombs and lure Bane to charge into the spot, then detonate them. When his health gets down to one bar, I just approached, landed a combo, and backed away. Thinking that you need to kill him with bombs made it much easier for me.

Is it just me, or is this some kind of discrimination against Koreans? If it is, someone’s gonna pay.]

El juego ha envejecido muy bien. No es un mundo abierto, tampoco un juego lineal puro. Yo diría que es un metroidvania. Se hace entretenido y te metes rápidamente en la historia. La dificultad va en aumento y poco a poco van implementando mecánicas nuevas por lo que se hace fácil aprender y mejorar. Es cierto la batalla final la cual se divide en dos partes , la segunda parte es bastante fácil si conoces el truco para vencer a Joker.
Que esté doblado al Español le suma puntos, y el doblaje es muy bueno. El actor que dobla a Batman es el mismo que lo dobla en las películas Españolas. Una vez te pasas el juego hay varios "minijuegos" con los que puedes exprimir mucho mas el juego. Por no hablar de otras misiones paralelas para pasarte el juego al 100% como los trofeos de enigma, las crónicas de Arkham, o las cintas de audio, lo cual si quieres lograrlo todo le te dará muchas horas mas de entretenimiento. 
Es un juego muy recomendable sobre todo si lo compras en alguna de las muchas ofertas de steam.

this game came out in 2009 yet it feels better to play than most modern games i've seen and played
the combat looks simple at first, but it quickly goes really deep with different enemy types and the freeflow mechanics
the stealth is just really simple and despite the challenges having some crazy setups required to complete them you'll probably never use them in game since you're not really encouraged to in the first place
the story is nothing special, i appreciate it more for the moments themselves rather than the plot or whatever
the bosses are just ass, definitely a weak point of the game
the riddler side stuff is... bearable, i guess? i mean, i did all 240 challenges without using any internet guides and it only took me around 21 hours to 100% the game
also if you're going for the 100% GOD FORBID YOU MISS OUT ON THE PARTY POOPER ACHIEVEMENT FOR THE LOVE OF GOD DON'T FORGET ABOUT IT HEED MY ADVICE
9/10

В сюжете рассказывается о событиях в лечебнице Аркхэм, которую захватили во время нахождения в ней Бэтмена и пойманного Джокера. Герою придется поймать клоуна, при этом побеждая других преступников и опасных злодеев, и наблюдать за картинами боли и смерти. Сможете ли вы спасти оставшихся работников лечебницы и посадить злодеев за решетку?
Бэтмен всегда символизировал мрак и боль, опасность и правосудие. Хотя я больше фанатка Джокера. Благодаря этой игре мы побудем на месте героя, мы сможем расследовать преступления и поучаствовать в интересной истории.
В игре хорошая графика, благодаря которой можно насладиться атмосферой мира Готэма. Оптимизация в игре практически идеальная, так как игра хоть и обладала открытым миром, но он был не очень большой и основой его были отдельные локации, то есть здания.
Присутствует атмосферная музыка, которая помогает в полной мере почувствовать эту ситуацию и историю в которую попал главный герой. Разработчики хорошо постарались в озвучке персонажей. Все мы знаем, что голос способен передать наш характер, нашу суть и мысли. В игре актерам удалось это сделать на высшем уровне, начиная от обычных охранников, которые были наполнены страхом и заканчивая главным антагонистом игры – Джокером.
Эта игра подойдет не только фанатам комиксов и особенно Темного рыцаря, но и обычным игрокам, так как в игре присутствует отличный сюжет, хорошая графика и отличная боевая система.

184778855.review:
- I started playing this game expecting it to suck because of its old age. I was pleasantly surprised when I realised that I was completely wrong. Of course the game shows its age at times, but overall I'd say that it is innovative even by today's standards.
- The story of the game takes place in Arkham island where the psychiatric asylum is situated. It allows free movement on the island so it's like a mini open world. Although it isn't anything mind-blowing, it does a great job portraying the characters from the Batman series.
- The graphics show their age but are perfectly serviceable. I encountered no bugs whatsoever and the game run without any crashes or difficulties.
- The Freeflow combat system requires you to have a basic level hand-eye coordination, nothing very demanding. It will never require you to go on tryhard mode. It is very fluid and satisfying to use and watch.
- Overall I would recommend this game without any hesitation.

184778094.review: Batman: Arkham Asylum é um jogo revolucionário para sua época, principalmente pelo combate fluído e por dar início à aclamada série de jogos do Batman. Aqui, a Ilha Arkham foi tomada por criminosos que escaparam com a ajuda de Coringa, o vilão principal e quem arquitetou o pesadelo que é essa noite para Batman. De forma geral, a história é interessante e bem-escrita, porém, há uma falta de profundidade e o desfecho, infelizmente, é o ponto baixo do jogo. A luta final é fraca, tanto quanto o seu contexto. A gameplay, em comparação com os outros jogos do Batman, é primitiva, mas é perdoável pela idade e pioneirismo no gênero. Mesmo sendo "primitiva", a gameplay é altamente satisfatória, com o combate sendo o ponto mais alto do jogo e as seções de stealth, juntamente com a utilização dos equipamentos de Batman, são bem inseridas e divertidas. Em conclusão, é um bom início para a série Batman: Arkham e, mesmo sendo bem curto (não é um mundo aberto), vale a pena ser jogado. Compre em uma promoção.

184776756.review:
Le jeu est bon je ne peux que le reconnaître, mais je n'irais pas jusqu'à dire qu'il est très bon voire le meilleur de la série, bien que je ne lui reproche pas son succès, car le jeu est rempli de défauts qui seront heureusement corrigés dans les opus suivants, je regarde en particulier Arkham City qui a su apporter toutes les bonnes améliorations et qui est, selon moi, le meilleur jeu de la série.

L'histoire est aujourd'hui bien connue, et malgré le fait que l'on ressente clairement que l'on va d'un lieu à un autre, et ce à cause de la structure du monde (j'y reviendrais), elle est toujours aussi bonne sans pour autant être un chef d'oeuvre absolu : la trame scénaristique fait le taf sans pour autant révolutionner quoi que ce soit, ce n'est pas sur ce point que le titre a changé la façon de faire des jeux.

Au niveau du gameplay, il a apporté des bases donnant un résultat médiocre, mais qui seront donc corrigés par la suite. Le combat est simple comparé aux combos déblocables par la suite, et bien qu'il fait bien les choses et soit très plaisant, il m'est arrivé de nombreuses fois de me retrouver à perdre un combo parce que Batman décidait d'attaquer dans le vide, ou bien qu'il décide de ne pas contrer une attaque ennemie. Je jouais sur clavier souris, donc potentiellement un gros skill issue de ma part, mais un bon système de combat aux commandes qui répondent mal, ça se note.

Dernier gros point je pense, le monde ouvert qui est très compressé, probablement pour le meilleur, alors qu'au même moment, d'autres font des mondes à rallonge où l'on ne sait regarder, ici on a juste quelques endroits assez simples, des pièces reliées par des couloirs, et dont les collectibles ne sont pas compliqués à trouver, même sans carte ! Je ne vais pas m'éterniser dessus, il y a le strict nécessaire et ça fonctionne bien ainsi. Concernant les lieux en eux-mêmes, leur structure est comparable aux mondes des metroidvanias, avec des lieux que vous débloquerez avec certains gadgets obtenus au fil de l'aventure, mais malgré tout, ce n'est pas ça qui va ralentir votre aventure, étant dictée par l'histoire.

Rapidement, le style artistique est vraiment bien choisi, bien que l'UI particulièrement n'ai pas été retenu pour les prochains jeux, il va plus dans l'esthétique de bande-dessinée, et sur le son et la musique, c'est du classique concernant Batman et ses apparitions audiovisuelles.

Arkham Asylum est le classique pour aborder les jeux d'après, mais c'est un jeu franchement correct je trouve. Ce n'est pas la masterclass que certains peuvent présenter, mais il n'est pas médiocre, vous allez vraiment passer un bon moment, soyez en sûr !

184768479.review:
Batman: Arkham Asylum is an incredible game that masterfully blends an engaging story, satisfying combat, and a rich, atmospheric world. The standout aspects are:

1.Immersive Atmosphere: The asylum feels alive with its eerie, gothic design, dark corners, and the sense of danger lurking everywhere. The setting perfectly captures the essence of Gotham's infamous mental institution.

Fluid Combat System: The free-flow combat system is intuitive yet rewarding, allowing you to seamlessly chain attacks, counters, and gadgets in beautifully choreographed fights.

2.Stealth Mechanics: Playing as Batman, you feel like a true predator, using shadows, grappling hooks, and gadgets to outsmart and take down enemies quietly.

3.Engaging Story and Characters: With writing by Paul Dini and performances like Mark Hamill's Joker and Kevin Conroy's Batman, the narrative keeps you invested while showcasing iconic villains in thrilling ways.

4.Exploration and Gadgets: The Metroidvania-style progression, with new gadgets unlocking areas and secrets, keeps exploration rewarding and fresh.

5.Detective Elements: Solving puzzles, investigating crime scenes, and finding Riddler trophies emphasize Batman’s intelligence and detective skills, making the gameplay varied.

My review of this game is as a comic book fan first and foremost, and all I can say is I can't believe I hadn't played it sooner. 

It really did a great job incorporating all the essential elements of Batman (crime fighting, cool gadgets, detective work) while bringing in a stunning creepy atmosphere of Arkham Asylum. The plot wasn't amazing by any stretch of the imagination but you can tell the people who made this game were Batman fans. It hit a lot of great iconic characters and even touched upon Batman's psyche in an interesting way.

I would love to come back and 100% this someday, but I'm too excited to continue on with the series to do it now. My only real complaint was the combat felt a bit stale after a while, so I'm eager to see what improvements are made in later installments.

184605287.review:
*NO STORY SPOILERS*
*Some gameplay spoilers*

At first the game didn't even run so I had to spend about 10 minutes of googling to find the fix. After sorting through multiple unhelpful answers, a steam forums post directed me to go into the game files and actually install DirectX properly. That was fine because it's an old game, and old games can be finicky, but that's something to lookout for. 
Another thing is that there were multiple cases where the game would crash and could not be closed even with Task Manager or alt-f4. When this happened my only option was to force restart my computer.

The story of the game is probably the strongest aspect. As it's a Batman game the more interested you are in the Batman lore the more interesting it will likely be for you, but that's not at all required. Although the story is too short in my opinion, it's still very entertaining, and keeps you wanting to see what happens next, (despite some painful flaws in the game).

The next best part about the game is the exploration and collectables. With metriodvania-esque aspects, and progression, and a constantly changing map, the exploration stays fresh and enticing. If you're the type of person who loves to collect things in games then there is plenty of fun to be had.

The stealth room clearing is okay. It can be a bit boring, and drag on for far too long at times, but the game tries to keep it interesting through adding new aspects as the game progresses.

The boss battles seem to me to mostly be filler. There's only a few boss battles but for the most part they're all the same (with one exception). The way the boss battles overly rely on the worst aspect of the game really holds them back.

The combat is bad. It's very clunky, unresponsive, and boring. It's easily the worst part about the game and is the reason for this being a negative review. The combat isn't the majority of the game, but the combat sections can really suck the fun out of the game. Short combat sections are fine but there are too many times when the combat stretches on for what feels like forever. In these never-ending combat sections the flaws really show themselves and grind the game to a halt. 

If you don't care about combat then consider this a positive review, but with how big a role it has in the gameplay loop, for me this is not a game I can recommend on anything other than a very large sale.
Also, I played on a mouse and keyboard so I can't comment on how things feel on controller.

184580478.review:
Évaluation : 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 (5/5)
"Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY – Une immersion parfaite dans l'univers du Chevalier Noir."

Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY, développé par Rocksteady Studios, est bien plus qu’un simple jeu de super-héros. Avec une ambiance sombre, un gameplay soigné et un respect profond pour l’univers de Batman, ce titre redéfinit ce qu’un jeu inspiré de comics peut offrir.

Les Points Forts :
✅ Une ambiance magistrale :
Arkham Asylum est un environnement à la fois oppressant et fascinant. Chaque recoin de l’asile, des cellules lugubres aux jardins toxiques, est riche en détails, renforçant l’immersion.

✅ Un scénario captivant :
L’histoire, écrite par Paul Dini, mélange tension, mystère et action. Le Joker, magistralement interprété par Mark Hamill, est un antagoniste charismatique et imprévisible, rendant chaque interaction mémorable.

✅ Un gameplay fluide et intuitif :
Le système de combat "Freeflow" est à la fois simple à prendre en main et profond, récompensant les combos fluides et la gestion stratégique des ennemis. Les phases de furtivité ajoutent une touche de stratégie, permettant à Batman de se fondre dans les ombres et d’éliminer ses adversaires avec précision.

✅ Des gadgets variés et ingénieux :
Batarang, grappin, gel explosif... chaque outil de Batman est intuitif à utiliser et enrichit le gameplay, que ce soit en combat ou lors des phases d’exploration.

✅ Une galerie de vilains iconiques :
En plus du Joker, vous affrontez d’autres ennemis célèbres comme Poison Ivy, Killer Croc, et Scarecrow. Les séquences psychédéliques avec Scarecrow sont particulièrement marquantes, jouant sur la psychologie et la peur.

✅ Un contenu généreux :
La version Game of the Year ajoute des défis supplémentaires pour les fans souhaitant prolonger l’expérience. Ces défis mettent vos compétences de combat et de furtivité à l’épreuve dans des environnements variés.

✅ Une performance technique solide :
Même des années après sa sortie, le jeu reste impressionnant grâce à sa direction artistique soignée et ses animations fluides. La bande-son épique et les doublages impeccables renforcent encore l'immersion.

Les Points Faibles :
⚠️ Un monde semi-ouvert :
Bien que l’asile soit dense et intéressant, il manque parfois la liberté d’un véritable monde ouvert. Cependant, cela reste cohérent avec le cadre et l’histoire.

⚠️ Quelques combats de boss répétitifs :
Certains affrontements, comme ceux contre les sbires sous stéroïdes, manquent de variété. Heureusement, les séquences narratives compensent largement.

En conclusion :
Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY est une œuvre incontournable pour les fans de Batman, mais aussi pour tout amateur de jeux d’action-aventure. Avec son gameplay innovant, sa narration captivante et son respect pour la mythologie du Chevalier Noir, il a établi une nouvelle norme pour les adaptations vidéoludiques de super-héros.

🎮 Verdict final :
Un classique intemporel qui brille par son ambiance, son gameplay et son amour pour l’univers de Batman.

⏳ Temps de jeu recommandé :

Campagne principale : 10 à 12 heures.
Défis GOTY et complétion : 20+ heures pour les perfectionnistes.
✨ Note personnelle : Une plongée immersive dans la peau du plus grand détective du monde, inoubliable et exaltante.

I'd say it's an amazing game all around. Fun story, small but content rich environment, a challenge for those who want it and a fun and relaxed time for those who don't. 

The game isn't burdened by useless content bloat just to fill the hours. 
I personally felt like it was made to tell a story in way that is fun for players while respecting our time.

In the 27 hours up to this review I finished the game on both the "normal" and "hard" difficulty, while also finding all collectables and completing all challenges on "normal" mode.
And all I can say about the game during this time is that I was having a blast.

Is it worth buying this game for the full price? (20€)
- I most definitely believe it is.

Is it worth buying during one of its many sales? (often up to 80% => 4€)
- Abso-f*cking-lutely! Get this game! And enjoy your time as Batman bashing in the heads of lunatics while they try doing the same to you! 

Have at its friends!

FOR GOTHAM!!!

It was alright.
Perhaps good for its time, but I didn't really feel as wowed as a lot of other people claim to have been.
Lots of recycling; fights, peon waves, puzzles, etc. (Riddler content was neat, but also got old, and especially so when you have to back track to get everything—I didn't.)
The fighting itself derives some mechanical satisfaction.
The gear feels like I'm just upgrading marshmallows into bigger ones that do the same thing with no significant effect combat-wise; nothing that I couldn't already do with regular fighting, anyways (which feels better, mind you).

Overall, 6.5/10
Would I recommend this game? I certainly would while it's on sale!
But its definitely not something I'd openly recommend to others as a "must-play".
Maybe to someone who really likes DC/Marvel content, otherwise not really.

184467496.review:
Arkham Asylum is pretty good, actually. I thought Arkham City infinitely superior, but upon replay all these years later I can finally admit that Asylum deserves it's reputation as a certified classic.
Asylum is slower and clunkier than the sequels in gameplay, story, and pacing, and many ideas are half-baked and massively improved upon in Arkham City. However, the slower pace gives Asylum its own identity, separate from the more open-worldy sequels. It's still full of original ideas, neat set pieces, and batman whimsy.
The boss fights aren't as bad as I remembered, although they still take massive shits on the freeflow combat system, forcing you to drop your combo and wait around as the bosses do their big attacks.

184426974.review:
Знаете, почему Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY Edition — это не просто игра, а настоящая супергеройская одиссея? Потому что это единственная игра, где ты чувствуешь себя не просто героем, а настоящим символом города. Ты не просто спасешь Готэм, ты сделаешь это так, что враги будут в ужасе от твоего появления, а ты при этом оставишь их с мыслями: «Как я вообще мог бы не попробовать встать на путь правды, если бы был на их месте?»

Играл в эту версию, и скажу вам: Arkham Asylum — это такой моментальный глоток свежего воздуха для тех, кто всегда хотел стать Бэтменом, но в реальной жизни, увы, нет возможности побегать по крышам в костюме с ушками. Всё настолько атмосферно и увлекательно, что ты легко забываешь, что это всего лишь игра.

Что мне особенно понравилось:

Ощущение Бэтмена. Это первая игра, где я реально почувствовал себя Бэтменом — ни одно кино или сериал не передаст этого. Тот самый момент, когда ты прыгаешь из тени, атакую врага, а затем исчезаешь в темноте. Все эти моменты с улучшениями, с батмобилем, с акцентом на скрытность — тут ты не просто сражаешься, ты планируешь каждый свой шаг, как настоящий стратег.

Графика и дизайн мира. Несмотря на возраст игры, она до сих пор выглядит потрясающе. Конечно, для GOTY Edition сделали улучшения, но сам мир Готэма и атмосфера психушки, наполненной сумасшедшими злодеями, просто захватывают. Детализированные локации и персонажи до сих пор удивляют своим качеством, а текстуры остаются вполне сочными для своего времени.

Глубокие персонажи. Игра не просто про «мочить злодеев». Здесь ты сталкиваешься с такими персонажами, как Джокер, Пугало и другими любимыми злодеями, каждый из которых проработан досконально. Джокер в этой игре — это не просто бандит с планами по захвату мира, а настоящий психопат, который доставляет удовольствие от каждой своей реплики.

Боёвка. Боевая система — это просто нечто! Это не стандартные драки с кнопками, а настоящий танец, где ты чувствуешь себя мастером боевых искусств. Каждый удар, контратака, комбо — это как симфония, а враги в этой игре чувствуют каждое твое движение.

Секреты и коллекционные предметы. Игра переполнена всевозможными скрытыми деталями, которые делают её ещё более увлекательной. Коллекционные предметы и пасхалки для фанатов комиксов — это отдельный плюс игры. Каждое собранное сокровище даёт возможность узнать ещё больше о вселенной Бэтмена, и с этим невозможно не увлечься.

Что не понравилось (если искать к чему придраться):

Отсутствие разнообразия в некоторых моментах. Несмотря на все плюсы игры, порой я ощущал, что бои начинают повторяться, особенно если долго не делать перерыв. Врагов много, но те же схватки немного однообразны на протяжении всего прохождения.

Некоторые моменты в сюжете немного затянуты. Есть определённые сегменты игры, где не так много экшена, а это может немного выбивать из игрового темпа.

Итог:
Batman: Arkham Asylum GOTY Edition — это игра, в которой ты почувствуешь себя Бэтменом не просто на словах, а на деле. Если ты фанат вселенной DC и хочешь узнать, что значит быть символом ночи, это идеальный выбор. Графика, боёвка, персонажи, атмосфера — всё здесь на высоте. Конечно, игра не идеальна, но это невероятно увлекательное путешествие по миру Готэма.

Tipp: Wie bei vielen anderen Spielen auch, kann man hier mit Texturmods das Spiel noch deutlich aufwerten, sodass man es dann teilweise wirklich nur noch an den Gesichtern sieht, dass das Spiel 14 Jahre auf dem Buckel hat.

☒ sehr gut

☐ nicht so gut

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
☐ sehr gut
☒ gut
☐ durchschnitt

☐ Kinder

Ich denke das Spiel ist in erster Linie für Erwachsene geeignet. Es ist zwar weder blutig noch sehen wir andere explizite Szenen, doch Gewalt spielt hier eine zentrale Rolle.

Das Spiel ist was für dich wenn...

- du Entscheidungen treffen möchtest, die sich auf die Geschichte auswirken

☐ kaum nennenswert.

Die Geschichte ist inhaltlich relativ banal, aber sie wird stilecht und actionreich erzählt. Wie ein typischer Superhelden-Film.

184247173.review:
*ALERTA DE SPOILER*

É um jogo simplesmente histórico, marca o início da saga de jogos de super-herói mais bem-feita de todos os tempos. Seu combate é inovador e divertido para sua época (2008), além do jogo possuir uma ambientação incrível e extremamente detalhada. 

Batman Arkham Asylum é um ótimo jogo pela sua história, e por mais que o combate final seja um pouco inesperado e poderia ser melhor, é essencial que o coringa use o TITAN, porque senão o jogo não seria do jeito que é nos próximos jogos da saga.

Em resumo, o jogo é divertido e inovador, mas para alguém que joga hoje em dia não acha tão incrível assim. Mesmo assim recomendo jogar pela história (contexto para os próximos jogos da saga), gameplay (cativante) e experiência (ambientação única).

184246457.review:
At first I actually did not want to play through the game since I'm not used to stealth games and would rather just punch/blast my way through enemies. However, since the game runs very well on the steam deck and uses very little power that extends the device's battery life, I decided to give it another shot and played this during my trip to HK. The combat still did not click with me, but I was able to overlook it. It actually started to get a little fun towards the end of the game after some upgrades. The key mechanic of its combat is to really be stealthy and plan your attack, which is what batman would have always done anyway. Narrative and game setting/environement however was superb IMO. Its also one of the reasons that kept me interested to finish the game. The asylum really felt threatening and eerie sometimes, which matches the situation of the events unfolding throughout the game.
Overall, I would still recommend this game since it is very well made, and it is also recommended to be played on the steam deck. The combat was just not for me, but I believe others will find it exciting. Other than the combat, I did not find anything else to fault in the game. 👍

184112175.review: Um dos meus jogos favoritos do Batman. Em comparação aos outros jogos da franquia mais ''recentes'' em relação ao mapa, esse foi o que mais trabalhou da melhor forma possível na complexidade da narrativa, level design, e o ambiente que te dá uma sensação de ''claustrofobia'' toda hora em lugares fechados, é muito bom pqp. A história te prende do começo ao fim, e ainda consegue te ''prender'' a fazer as missões secundárias pra descobrir a história do próprio Asilo Arkham, dos outros personagens por meio de áudios. E tem os puzzles do Charada, que apesar de eu odiar fazer nos outros jogos, te garanto que nesse é até que bem divertido pela simplicidade, não precisa quebrar a cabeça em 250 puzzles espalhados pelo mapa ou olhar no youtube (para os preguiçosos). E até que pra quem gosta de platinar igual a mim, recomendo e vale a pena, não é tão complicado, só tomar cuidado com 1-2 conquistas que são perdíveis na run. Comprem e se divirtam!!!!!

183928161.review:
çok başarılı bir üçlemenin ilk oyunu olan Batman: Arkham Asylum harika bir oyun
 
insanların büyük bir kısmı eski oyunlara şuan ki zamana bakarak yorumlayıp inceleyenlere kızıyor
bu insanların haksız olduğunu ve oynanmış olan oyunun oynandığı zamana göre değerlendirilmesi gerektiğini düşünüyorum
eğer bu oyun hakkında 2009 da yorum yapacak olsaydım çok farklı şeyler söylerdim... demek isterdim ANCAK bu oyun 2025 yılında bile taş gibi bir oyun
hikayesi klasik bir batman hikayesi joker sorun çıkartır batman onu durdurur ama bu bir çizgi roman ya da animasyon değil bu bir oyun ve batman i kontrol eden biziz 
2009 da süper kahraman oyunları yok dense doğruydu şimdi bakınca serinin devam oyunları ve spider-man oyunları dışında hala bu oyun gibi zevk veren bir süper kahraman oyunu yok
şuanda bile suçluları döverken o yumruğun ağırlığını sertliğini çok güzel hissettiriyor 
oyunun istediğimiz zaman istediğimiz yerine gidebildiğimiz bir haritası var ama riddler ın bulmacaları hariç içinde yan görev ya da etkinlik bulundurmuyor e bu kötü mü? tabikide hayır
oyunun haritasının her bir karışını hikaye ile beraber keşfediyoruz ve hiç sıkıcı bir yer geçen bir nokta hatırlamıyorum
hatta daha önce Batman: Arkham City yi 2. defa oynamak istediğimde nedense ilk oynıyışım gibi zevk vermemişti ama Arkham Asylum bana yine ilk oynıyışım gibi zevk verdi ve nedenini anladım 
arkham city bolca yan görev ve içerik bulundurduğundan haritayı 2. defa gezip yan içerikleri yapmak pek zevkli gelmemişti ancak arkham asylum da yan bir içerik bulunmadığı ve ana hikayede akıcı bir şekilde ilerlediğinden tempoyu bozmadan ikinci bir defa daha oyunu bitirdim 
tabi yanlış anlaşılmasın tartışmaya kapalı bir şekilde arkham city kesinlikle arkham asylum dan hem oynanış hemde hikaye ve ilerleyişi açısından daha üstün bir oyun
anlatmak istediğim aslında bu oyunlardan biri yan içerik bulundurmadığından bir süre sonra oyunu tekrardan tempolu bir şekilde oynıyabilirken diğer oyunu sıkıcı olmasalar bile yan içerikleri tekrardan yapmak tempoyu çok düşürüyor
arkham asylum un çizgisel olması ve sadece hikaye odaklı ilerleyişine bayılıyorum

daha önce batman oyunu oynamamış ve başlamayı düşünüyorsanız asylum kesinlikle hala oynanabilecek çok kaliteli bir oyun 
eğer yakın zamanda arkham city ya da knight oynadı iseniz oynanış olarak biraz sıkıntı yaşıyabilirsiniz ancak yukarıda dediğim gibi kesintisiz bir şekilde akan giden hikayesi sizi memnun eder 

Batman: Arkham Asylum 2025 yılına göre 7,6/10 lık bir oyundur bana göre (2024 aralıkta oynadım bitirdim 1 aydan bişey olmaz)

183912229.review: Um joguinho muito clássico da categoria heróis, criado com minucioso cuidado e amor em todos os seus aspectos. Arkham Asylum foi um dos se não o primeiro jogo da série Arkham, que apesar de pertencer a uma geração de jogos relativamente antiga, 2009/2010, este envelheceu muito bem tanto graficamente quanto em suas mecânicas que, mesmo para contextos atuais ainda inova e se sobrepõe à muitos grandes lançamentos modernos. Mas o que realmente impressiona é o polimento foda para os padrões da época. No geral, para aqueles que gostam de clássicos de heróis semi-linear e têm interesse nos maiores do Batman, a série Arkham, super vale o investimento no Arkham Asylum para ser jogado antes ou mesmo depois dos lançamentos mais recentes e ainda assim, provavelmente, te surpreenderá.

This is the game that started the Arkham series, which would become one of the best Batman video game franchises of all time. I'd even argue that it is the peak of Batman media. Mark Hamill as the Joker is unparalleled, the atmosphere is surreal, and the game sets an incredibly high bar for the legendary sequels. While the first game leans more on the fighting side than the detective elements, its still got a decent balance that would only improve in later titles. Simply put, the game is an awesome ride for any Batman fan and it includes many comic-faithful nods that will keep you grinning!

Sidenote - You CAN get it to work on a steam deck too, just takes a bit of "tweaking" to "unlock" the deck.

183648144.review:
Честно, устанавливая и заходя в игру вообще не ожидал, что она меня зацепит. Игра уже старая, супергеройский сеттинг не то чтобы мой любимый, а уж тем более вселенная Бэтмена, с которой я знаком только через фильмы Нолана (а как вы знаете там раскрытию всего мира уделяется не так много времени).

Но знаете что! Смело назову эту игру прекрасной даже на текущий момент. За исключением очевидных минусов (по типу примитивной боёвки) я не заметил ничего такого, что заставляло бы игру надоесть мне. 

Смотрите сами:

1. [b] Сюжет [/b] хоть и по обыкновению супергеройщины простой, но выстроен грамотно и следовать по нему более менее интересно. Что ещё было интересно лично для меня, так это сторонний лор, который реализован здесь через загадки Риддлера с последующим описанием некоторых персонажей вселенной и записи интервью пациентов. И я, напоминаю, с лором Бэтмена вообще не знаком, при этом собирал все эти загадки, жуков и записи с особым рвением, а значит фанатам точно зайдёт зайдёт.

2. [b] Графика [/b] выглядит очевидно устаревшей на этот год, именно текстуры, но сам дизайн мира и персонажей — моё почтение. В целом атмосфера Аркхема, мрачной психбольницы с особо опасными преступниками, передана восхитительно. С первых часов появляется эффект иммерсивности и по большей части это заслуга именно визуала.

3. [b] Геймплей [/b] вас также вряд ли чем-то удивит, в основном бегаешь-бьешь. Но разработчики грамотно почувствовали опасность подобного малообразия и постарались разбавить это всё загадками Риддлера, стелсом и особыми сюжетными элементами, как например кошмары Крейна, беготня от Крока и прочее. Про сами драки уже в начале упомянул, ничего особенного, в основном бей-уворачивайся-отпрыгивай. Босс-файты немного разочаровали, там-то хоть могли за рамки выйти, но в итоге это также абсолютно легкие и читаемые последовательности действий.

4. Отдельно хочется выделить [b] актёров [/b], которые озвучивали персонажей. Они также усилили эффект погружения, особенно Джокер в исполнении Марка Хэммила (да-да, тот самый Люк Скайвокер). Был очень удивлён, когда узнал, что это он, ведь самому распознать этого мужичка по ходу игры нереально, что и доказывает выдающийся результат. Другие актёры тоже молодцы.

Учитывая что игра достаточно короткая по нынешним меркам и очень дешевая на распродажах, крайне рекомендую. У меня на сюжет с нахождением всех Ридлеровских приколов ушло 10 часов. В игре также есть испытания, которые я вряд ли пройду, но для кого-то возможно это будет очередным плюсом.

[b] 7,5/10 [/b]

183599818.review: É um jogo incrível, quando você termina se torna visível como ele se tornou um GOTY naquela época. O combate é muito bom, não é enjoativo, o sistema de níveis e evolução da tecnologia do Batman é interessante e a exploração é dinâmica com novas ferramentas de auxílio sendo liberadas a todo tempo, com base na progressão da campanha, fazendo você passar pelo mesmo lugar mais de uma vez para liberar algo que não conseguia antes. Outro aspecto positivo da exploração são as charadas, deixa o mundo mais interessante e empolgante de ser explorado, além de muito recompensador... te ensina mais sobre os personagens, dá experiência para passar de nível e complementa a história principal. É muito satisfatório terminar a campanha e fazer 100% das charadas, como também necessário se você quiser liberar todos os upgrades para fazer os desafios. Enfim, não platinei (pelo menos não ainda) mas cheguei muito perto e a sensação é a mais realizadora possível, joguem!
